meanings.definition: Any of a group of steroid hormones that promote the development and maintenance of female characteristics of the body.
meanings.sent1: Estrogens play a role in developing female traits.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes prescribe estrogens to help with certain health conditions.
meanings.sent3: The estrogens in the body decided to throw a party for the other hormones.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a surge of estrogens, filling the room with warmth and joy.
meanings.sent5: The power of estrogens in shaping the body is truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: A synthetic compound with estrogenic properties.
meanings.sent1: This medication contains synthetic estrogens to mimic natural hormones.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the effects of different types of estrogens on the body.
meanings.sent3: The lab accidentally spilled the synthetic estrogens, resulting in some very happy mice.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a dose of synthetic estrogens, bringing comfort and reassurance.
meanings.sent5: The impact of synthetic estrogens on health is a topic of ongoing research.
